select distinct t.id FROM ( SELECT u.id AS id,urr.create_time from user_role_relation urr join `user` u on urr.user_id = u.id
urr.source_id = #{request.projectId} and u.deleted = 0
and (u.name like CONCAT('%', #{request.keyword},'%') or u.email like CONCAT('%', #{request.keyword},'%') or u.phone like CONCAT('%', #{request.keyword},'%'))
order by urr.create_time desc ) t

select distinct u.* from user_role_relation urr join `user` u on urr.user_id = u.id where u.deleted = 0
and urr.source_id = #{organizationId}
and (u.name like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or u.email like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
order by u.name limit 100
